description2: A fantastic platform for improving your frontend development skills by working on real-world projects. It offers challenges where you can practice HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.

Create an app where employers can easily add employees to specific roles through a form, while also allowing them to update and track employees based on their positions for better organization and communication.
An app where you can add your tasks edit them and delete. Goes according the priority of your tasks from low to high
A list of items you want to buy.
This project demonstrates the use of MongoDB to manage a simple library system. It includes collections for books, authors, and patrons, along with operations to query and manipulate data.
using node js to create an array of items then bring it to the frontend to create a board game where you have to memorise!
